description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts that describes the status of product evaluation. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PCR segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0247 (Status of Evaluation, version 2.3)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: Evaluation anticipated, but not yet begun

definition.value: Evaluation anticipated, but not yet begun

display.value: Product received in condition which made analysis impossible

definition.value: Product received in condition which made analysis impossible

display.value: Product discarded -- unable to follow up

definition.value: Product discarded -- unable to follow up

display.value: Product remains implanted -- unable to follow up

definition.value: Product remains implanted -- unable to follow up

display.value: Problem already known, no evaluation necessary

definition.value: Problem already known, no evaluation necessary

display.value: Product under quarantine -- unable to follow up

definition.value: Product under quarantine -- unable to follow up

display.value: Product unavailable for follow up investigation

definition.value: Product unavailable for follow up investigation
